price: Firavun’un kavminden ileri gelenler, dediler ki: “Şüphesiz bu adam gayet bilgin bir sihirbazdır.”
arabic: قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسَٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla al-mala-u min qawmi fir'ʿawna inna hādhā lasāḥirun ʿalīmun
